name: Eurovent Certita Certification
memberOrga: Not applicable. As a company ECC does not provide membership-related services
goal: Founded in 1993, Eurovent Certita Certification is a leading independent certification company in the field of third-party product performance certification for Heat Ventilation Air Conditioning and Refrigeration (HVACR) products. Based on a voluntary scheme, our third-party certification is open to all manufacturers as well as to distributors. ECC fulfils the requirements of the EN ISO/CEI 17065:2012 standards for independent certification bodies and is accredited as such by the French authority COFRAC. Through its activity, ECC offers the most comprehensive data base of certified products, covering up to 40 product families
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Research and innovation
